website_summaries.verdict: Great smelling hair wax has a creamy texture and strong hold.
pros: Shaping wax with a lightweight texture
This wax has Aveda's signature smell – a mix of certified organic grapefruit, ginger, and geranium
Easy to use and doesn't require any extra styling skills
Offers a firm and flexible hold
cons: The smell is really good, but can be overwhelming for those with a sensitive nose

customer_reviews.title: Healthier, shinier hair
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful. Not only does it control hair, but it smells wonderful as well. Would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Light. Not greasy. doesn’t weigh your hair down.
customer_reviews.text: Good for thin hair or hair that needs to preserve its volume. Holds it in place. Is a nice lighter option from hair spray.
customer_reviews.author: awhal

customer_reviews.title: Repeat order
customer_reviews.text: I reordered this product to give my hair some texture after brushing. I have used it for several years and found it to be best used sparingly when finishing your hairstyle. In a small quantity...pea sized..rubbed between hands I can give my hair more form and help set it with the addition of light hairspray.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Texture without stiffness. Smells amazing. Good supplier.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite hair product of all time. This supplier was fast and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold
customer_reviews.text: Product did not hold the style. My thin hair went flat quickly. I tried using a lot, a little, and the product did not work for me. I’m going back to the paste which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Welch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is a great product and does what it should
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Not like the salon ones
customer_reviews.text: I have used the product for years and due to the pandemic decided to purchase here instead of in salon. The product arrived boiling hot, liquified and the packaging is old and lighter in color. Disappointed and will not order again
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but not amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I would rate this product as just okay for my hair, which is pretty straight and limp. I don't think it works any better than John Freida Secret Weapon which is only about $8.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi A Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Good, expensive, but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I like Aveda products, although I understand that a lot of beauty professionals don’t (large quantity buys needed to open and maintain an account). This finishing cream is lighter than their humectant/anti-humectant products and not as greasy but still does the job of holding your style without the schmutz.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Randall

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a good light weight texturing creme. However, I don't care for the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Ellis

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.text: Best stuff out there. It gives short hair texture but stays light and air without feeling greasy or crispy. A little bit goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed with this hair texturizing creme.
customer_reviews.text: This Aveda product goes well for any female with short, fine hair looking for that extra boost in their morning styling routine.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: hair-tastic
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love it!! works great in my hair! would recommend it to others!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Munroe

customer_reviews.title: I like this product!
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this product works in my hair. i'm glad I can still get it from you!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Love

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Not what I thought I was ordering but I'm using g it regardless. It is light, not oily or sticky or waxy. Helps lift hair, + add column.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Paul

customer_reviews.title: Nice cream!
customer_reviews.text: My wife like it a lot ! So Im happy too! :) The price is right and with gas so expensive it is better to get delivered!
customer_reviews.author: G. Mannone

customer_reviews.title: Don`t believe everything you read.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed,expected more texture .what works for some doesn`t work for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It arrived shortly after purchase and was exactly the siz offered
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Usually buy this in an Aveda salon, but the convenience of online buying is great. Both my husband and I use this product. It gives body to your hair but not greasy and light.
customer_reviews.author: Maryellen

customer_reviews.title: I need a different styling product for thick hair and am having trouble getting a return label
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this creme doesn't do anything for my thick hair. I should have ordered the texturizing whip or wax. Amazon return policy states that most items can be returned within 30 days but to check the product's return policy. It said, "see Amazon return policy". I'd like to return this $30 item and purchase one that is for thick hair but when I go to my orders to select return, it's not an option. Frustrating...
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, lightweight and controls the frizz
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It smells great, is very lightweight and doesn’t weigh my fine-but-curly hair down. It smooths and controls the frizz when it is humid. Just a great product for my specific hair type.
customer_reviews.author: D. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not great
customer_reviews.text: I've used Method Madness for several years, but its not on Amazon anymore. I want it back. This is not nearly as good.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Ligon

customer_reviews.title: Does what it claims
customer_reviews.text: Holds my hair even in the worst humidity. Takes only a small dab, without being sticky. I love the fresh smell. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: fragrance4me

customer_reviews.title: Adds body without the extra weight
customer_reviews.text: Makes my hair more manageable and adds body. Wash my hair every day and helps dryness
customer_reviews.author: Pat S, Tucson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Makes all those whispy hairs calm down. Just wish this product was not so expensive!
customer_reviews.author: S Battersby

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell and it works great on my hair
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell and it works great on my hair! Can be a little sticky if too much is used.
customer_reviews.author: Garney

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: great product highly recommended. Makes your hair shine. Great for over processed hair. It is light not greasy. Recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't a new product for me. I originally purchased it from my hair salon after my stylist used it on me. It's good for defining curls and doesn't feel greasy or stiff. It lasts quite a long time also.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Love this Aveda product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It gives my hair body, shine, and it smells wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rhyne

customer_reviews.title: Smelled stale and awful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the fragrance mostly, but this jar smelled stale and awful. Maybe old?
customer_reviews.author: colleen rockwell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and the scent is light, clean and refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: david p hudak

customer_reviews.title: Light, non-greasy, little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: I have Asian, thick hair, with coarse strands. I used to use Sebastian Xtah Twisted Taffy. I love Aveda's Light Elements Texturizing Creme, bc it's light, I can achieve texture, piecey-hair-look without feeling like there's a ton of product in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: SAF

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as described
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this product. I reviewed this item before making the purchase. It does nothing for my hair, in fact it just "wets" it down, even when using a small amount. I invested in a worthless product.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: and does its job. I have fine hair and it light enough to use
customer_reviews.author: AddieT

customer_reviews.title: It works on pixie cuts!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for years. That should speak volumes!!
customer_reviews.author: BGK

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients have been changed; not so great anymore
customer_reviews.text: After 2019, Aveda totally changed the ingredients of their Light Elements Texturizing Creme. This used to be a 5-star product, but the last great jar I bought was in 2019. If you are buying this in 2020 and you are a repeat user of this product, be warned that you may not like the revamped product... or scent. Still hoping I can luck across the original ingredients on Amazon somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Annie-mal

customer_reviews.title: Great to bounce up the hair
customer_reviews.text: I have straight hair.After I wash it and dry up, I would use some of this cream to rub up in hand, and then touch the hair from end to up. It makes my hair bounce with active shape, look flexible and lively. Sometimes the straight looks boring, but this cream can create a new wave of your hairstyle, just like you just wake up.
customer_reviews.author: Janey

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps on the shelf too long?
customer_reviews.text: It didn't smell as good as I remembered it, and fragrance was one of the main reasons I liked that brand. It seemed stale, old perhaps?
customer_reviews.author: Karen Rockwell

customer_reviews.title: Great product for light hold and added thickness
customer_reviews.text: I have very straight, fine hair. This product is great, because it has just enough hold, for styling my hair, without making it feel like I have some sort of product in it. Plus, all the Aveda products I have ever used smell awesome.
customer_reviews.author: TaDa!Top Contributor: Aquascaping

customer_reviews.title: It's a great light product for my super fine hair that other ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great light product for my super fine hair that other products are just too heavy for and its especially terrific for those horrible static days! I just tap my index finger on the top of the product and rub my hands together and run them through my hair....Voila, static cling gone and the smell is divine...a nice clean, crisp smell. I would most definitely recommend this product to anyone out there with fine hair, it won't weight it down.
customer_reviews.author: lynn

product_meta.title: Aveda Light Elements Texturizing Creme, 2.6 Ounce
product_meta.description: This product is made from organic bee's wax and pullulan to help provide light, flexible all-day hold. Plant emulsifiers from jojoba and soy give the product a soft and creamy texture. A blend of gamma oryzanol (from rice bran) and sasa veitchii (bamboo) help protect hair from UV damage. Spicy-citrus aroma features certified organic mandarin.
feature_bullets: Offers a soft and creamy texture
